meanings.definition: To run the gantlet: to endure a series of troubles or difficulties
meanings.sent1: She felt like she was gantleting through a maze of challenges at work.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers were gantleting through the harsh terrain during their training exercise.
meanings.sent3: After gantleting through the chaotic traffic, he finally reached his destination.
meanings.sent4: Facing the final exam felt like gantleting through a storm of questions.
meanings.sent5: The protagonist was gantleting through a web of lies to uncover the truth.
